sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'
import { Body, Heading, Centering, Background, SubmitButton, FormElements} from './styles'
import { storageRef } from '../../base'
import  { v4 } from 'uuid'
import { uploadBytes } from 'firebase/compat/storage'

const UpdatePhotosForm = () => {
    const [imageUpload, setImageUpload] = useState(null)
    

    const uploadImage = () => {
        console.log('in the event handler')
        console.log(storageRef)
        console.log(imageUpload)
        
        // create a reference to the imageUpload
        const imageRef = storageRef.child(`images/${imageUpload.name+v4()}`) // ensures unique names for each photo upload
        imageRef.put(imageUpload).then((snapshot)=>{console.log('uploaded')}).catch((err)=>{console.log(err)})
        if(imageUpload==null) return;
        
    }
  return (
    <Body>

        <Centering>
            <Background>
                <Heading>Add Images</Heading>
                <FormElements>
                   
                    <input type='file' onChange={(e)=>{setImageUpload(e.target.files[0])}}></input>
                    <SubmitButton onClick={uploadImage}>Upload Image</SubmitButton>
                </FormElements>
                
            </Background>
        </Centering>
    </Body>
  )
}

export default UpdatePhotosForm
